text: I took the online Conversational Chinese course for beginners at Elite Linguistic Academy, and it was an excellent experience! The teacher is very knowledgeable and methodical, making the lessons easy to follow. The course is well-structured, with bite-sized portions that help with better understanding and retention. I saw a significant improvement in my Chinese skills after subscribing to the lessons. Highly recommended for anyone looking to learn Chinese effectively!

I had a wonderful experience with Marina Laoshi during my Term 1 Chinese classes. As a non-native speaker, mastering pronunciation and tones was particularly challenging for me, but Marina Laoshi was exceptionally patient and dedicated. She ensured that we grasped the basics thoroughly, creating a supportive environment that greatly enhanced our learning process. We got to show off our rudimentary mandarin while ordering food during our term end class dinner.

I've joined conversional chinese class term 1 from feb'21. First course was great to complete then i continued to term 2. Also well complete. Then again to term 3 and just finished it last week. Now i'm in Term 4 and will enroll to Term 5 again. As I really enjoyed it and have learned a lot. Quite helpful for learning Chinese.  Thanks to the teacher ZOEY and all the people involved in creating this learning opportunity. I would recommend this Elite Learning Centre .

Good lessons and affordable. The small class size enhanced my learning. Everything is well planned out and clear. The additional tips for conversational chinese specific to Singapore context are quite helpful. Very happy to have found ELN and to complete the Conversational Chinese Term 1 classes. Hope to join the next set of classes soon.

Learning Mandarin with Elite Linguistic has honestly been much easier than my experience in school. The classes aren't just about reading a passage in the given textbook and as the classes aren't as packed the teachers can help students on a more personal level. From my experiences with 老师 Cruyff and Weina I can proudly say that my mandarin skills have noticeably improved.
